news.title: v4 Complete
news.info: It's been a really long time since I've posted to Flashden. I've been hacking away at this great template for the past 6 months - in between holding babies and a fulltime job - it's finally come to fruition. It borrows much of the functionality behind the already hugely successful v3 and holds tremendous structural and programming improvements. It's been a challenge to build. The great thing about this is that I consider this to be a flexible structure from which to build many different types of websites. If you're not very tech-minded you can still customize this site a great deal to look like what you want. If you're pretty handy with Flash, you can achieve a totally new look & feel without having to hack too much code. Special Characters àáâãäß é ê í ü.

news.title: Development begins
news.info: Development for XML Portfolio Template v4 has begun.

news.title: About this news module
news.info:
This news module is managed by XML and styled with CSS. This news module is categorized by year. You can add an unlimited amount of news items.
  • This text field is HTML-enabled so you can have lists like this
  • Scrollbars only appear when they're needed
  • That goes for the text field you're viewing here and also the news list to the left
    • This is an example of a link. Bold Text Italics Text Bold and Italics Text You can also load in images like this. I can also change the font color directly like this. Check out the other news examples to see how this thing runs. Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetuer adipiscing elit. Nullam auctor augue sed felis. Aliquam quis ipsum.
